item.title: About Me
item.description: About MetalBlueberry I’m a passionate developer moving toward the specialization in IoT technologies. I feel comfortable working with Python and Go as most of my recent development time has been invested with those two languages but I have experience with other popular languages such as C/C++, C# and Java. I’m always looking for new challenges and constantly learning new things. Technical background I’ve experience with several technologies from the IoT world from the sensors to the cloud infrastructure.

item.title: About Me - The long story
item.description: About MetalBlueberry I’m a programmer since I discovered that things could be automated. Attention You are about to read my life since I remember it, focused on how I became a professional developer. The beginning I started with Win-logo in the school by drawing some figures with simple functions. I still remember what could be one of the firsts function I’ve ever wrote. tits(size) The objective is clear, draw two tangent circles of a desired size.

item.title: Social Networks
item.description: Follow me on GitHub, Twitter and Linkedin! www.github.com/MetalBlueberry www.twitter.com/MetalBlueberry www.linkedin.com/in/victorperezdomingo
